# load(withID:withCompletionHandler:)

**Type Method**

Loads a specific match with the specified identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
class func load(withID matchID: String, withCompletionHandler completionHandler: ((GKTurnBasedMatch?, (any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
class func load(withID matchID: String) async throws -> GKTurnBasedMatch
```

## Parameters

- **matchID**: The identifier for the turn-based match.
- **completionHandler**: The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.

The block receives the following parameters:



## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/matchData] property of the match object is `nil` until you fetch the data from Game Center using the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/loadMatchData(completionHandler:)] method.

## Loading Existing Matches

- **loadMatches(completionHandler:)**: Fetches the turn-based matches from Game Center that the local player participates in.

items.description: Fetches the turn-based matches from Game Center that the local player participates in.
